Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Vemurafenib is approved to treat patients whose cancer has a certain mutation in the BRAF gene, including:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Melanoma that cannot be removed by surgery or has spread to other parts of the body.

Section.Para: Vemurafenib is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
